subject: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Homosexuality
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Legislation that bans promoting homosexuality in Russia has some gay rights advocates calling for protests or a boycott of the 2014 Olympics in Sochi.
snippet: Legislation that bans promoting homosexuality in Russia has some gay rights advocates calling for protests or a boycott of the 2014 Olympics in Sochi.
